schema.scores: List(Struct([Field('scorer', Utf8), Field('fuzz', Float32), Field('simulation', Float32), Field('detection', Float32), Field('embedding', Float32)]))

schema_notes.semantic_similarity: Pairwise cosine similarities between this explainer and all other explainers for the same feature, calculated directly from explanation embeddings. Replaces deprecated semsim_mean and semsim_max fields.
schema_notes.decoder_similarity: Cosine similarities between this feature's decoder vector and all other features
schema_notes.scores: Evaluation scores from all LLM scorers for this explanation
